additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Polybutene, Octyldodecanol, Mica, Diisopropyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil, Silica Silylate, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Mother of Pearl, Aroma, Barium Sulfate, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Colophonium/Rosin/Colophane, Benzoic Acid, BHT MAY CONTAIN:Iron Oxides (CI 77491, 77499) Red 21 (CI 45380) Red 27 (CI 45410) Red 28 Lake (CI 45410) Red 6 (CI 15850) Red 7 (CI 15850) Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140)

description: Revlon Kiss Glow Lip Oil leaves a subtle hint of colour with a conditioning oil complex, including natural crambe abyssinica seed oil, moringa oil and micronized mother of pearl, that revitalizes and moisturises lips.
name: Kiss Glow Berry Brilliant Lip Oil
